name: Blink
description: Blink into a world of after-images, where you can walk on light. Solve puzzles by manipulating lights and blinking between worlds. Explore hand drawn landscapes while uncovering the secrets behind this strange power.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.0+ GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 Storage: 200 MB available space
